item.title: TrumpRx
item.description: Best ProductsLaunchesNewsForumsAdvertiseLaunched this weekLaunched this weekFind the world's lowest prices on prescription drugs61 followersFind the world's lowest prices on prescription drugs61 followersTrumpRx is a website that lists discounted drug prices from manufacturers that have agreed to Most Favored Nation (MFN) pricing. Americans can use TrumpRx to purchase drugs in cash (outside of their insurance). These drugs can be obtained at participating pharmacies using coupon cards displayed on TrumpRx or directly through manufacturers' websites.

item.title: Show HN: RuneScapeCN (open source) – UI kit with authentic OSRS styling
item.description: Launching RuneScapeCN today! First time doing OSS. It’s an OSRS-themed UI component set built on familiar shadcn patterns: - React 19 + TypeScript - Tailwind CSS v4 - Radix primitives - Vite + CVA - Hosted registry endpoints for direct component install Goal: keep the classic RuneScape visual identity while still being easy to ship in modern React apps. If you try it, I’d appreciate candid feedback on what to improve first. URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=47039839 Points: 1 # : 0

item.title: Actualité : Apple confirme son événement du 4 mars : vers un MacBook à prix inédit et un nouvel iPhone
item.description: Les rumeurs vous ont embrouillés, tant elles tablent sur des lancements de produits à des dates variées ? Cette fois, c'est du concret, puisque c'est Apple qui l'annonce. Il y aura bien un événement de présentation de produits organisé par la Pomme, et ce sera pour le 4 mars. Le rendez-vous est pris non pas dans son fief californien, mais à New York,...

item.title: Google corrige Android 16 avant de lancer Android 17
item.description: Google s’apprête à lancer la première bêta d’Android 17, huit mois après le déploiement d’Android 16, tandis qu’Android 16 QPR3 viendra stabiliser une dernière fois les appareils compatibles.

item.title: Stargate SG-1 sur Netflix : les 7 meilleurs épisodes de la série de science-fiction !
item.description: 10 saisons et plus de 200 épisodes d'un show considéré par beaucoup comme culte arrivent sur Netflix. Et s'il fallait une raison de (re)visionner Stargate SG-1, voici notre top des 7 meilleurs épisodes de la série de science-fiction.

item.title: Actualité : Xiaomi 17 et 17 Ultra : les prix en Europe ont fuité, et c'est une excellente surprise
item.description: Toujours bien informé, ce site de bons plans. Expert en matière de fuites de prix avant la sortie de nouveaux produits - il semble que ses sources soient très proches d’au moins un revendeur français -, Dealabs dévoile le prix de vente des futurs smartphones premium de Xiaomi. En l’absence de mention de ses sources et en attendant l’officialisation d...

item.title: Actualité : “Une année exceptionnelle pour le Mac” : Apple prépare une avalanche de nouveautés pour les prochaines semaines
item.description: Outre l’iPhone 17e, probablement annoncé dans les jours à venir, Apple aurait d’autres produits en stock pour ce début d’année 2026. D’après le très bien renseigné Mark Gurman, les prochaines semaines et les prochains mois seraient en effet riches en nouveautés pour l’univers Mac. La liste des produits attendus pour l’occasion a d’ailleurs été partag...

item.title: CoThou Autonomous Superagent
item.description: This is the 2nd launch from CoThou Autonomous Superagent. View more CoThou Autonomous SuperagentLaunching todayReasoning from first principles to turn thoughts into actionCoThou is an autonomous superagent that reasons from first principles to turn users’ thoughts and complex tasks into actionable deliverables. Each task runs in an isolated sandbox for maximum security and can work fully autonomously for up to 24 hours—without any human intervention—until completion.Free OptionsLaunch Team / Built With

item.title: Cline CLI 2.0
item.description: This is the 2nd launch from Cline. View more Cline CLI 2.0Launched this weekParallel agents & headless CI/CD in your terminalTrusted by 5M+ developers, the Cline CLI brings autonomous coding directly to your command line. Fully open source, redesigned from the ground up. Features parallel agents, headless mode for CI/CD, and ACP support for any editor (Zed, Neovim).FreeLaunch tags:Open Source•Developer Tools•Artificial IntelligenceLaunch Team

item.title: Your Love Style
item.description: Most standard personality tests use a self-reporting mechanism (a questionnaire, a Likert scale) to type someone. But how you answer is completely different than how you act? I wanted to make a quiz that felt more like a scenario game, with context. One that assess how you behave, and then analyzes your results from your actions. Please give it a shot. It's completely free and also doesn't need a log in to see your full results. :)

item.title: WikiTrip 2.0
item.description: This is the 2nd launch from WikiTrip. View more WikiTrip 2.0Launched this weekLocation-based audio guide powered by WikipediaWikiTrip is an app that reads out interesting Wikipedia articles around you. Perfect for roadtrips, daily commutes or city trips. Learn about the world around you!FreeLaunch tags:iOSLaunch Team / Built With

item.title: Seedance 2.0
item.description: This is the 3rd launch from PixelDance & Seaweed. View more Seedance 2.0Launched this weekAdvanced AI video creation with precise narrative controlSeedance 2.0 by ByteDance is an advanced AI video generation model built for cinematic, multi-shot storytelling. It creates consistent characters, smooth transitions, and dynamic camera movements from simple prompts. Designed for creators, marketers, and filmmakers, it gives you greater control over motion, scene composition, and narrative flow—making AI video feel more like directing a real film.Free OptionsLaunch Team

item.title: JDoodle.ai MCP
item.description: This is the 3rd launch from JDoodle.ai. View more JDoodle.ai MCPLaunching todayBuild and deploy web apps straight from ChatGPT/ClaudeJDoodle.ai MCP connects with ChatGPT/Claude, so you can build websites and web apps directly through chat. You interact with ChatGPT/Claude like normal, while your project is created and updated inside JDoodle.ai with live preview. When you're ready, just ask the AI to publish and JDoodle.ai generates a live link instantly. Unlike one-time generation workflows, you can keep iterating, fixing issues, and shipping updates through chat.

item.title: GoClaw
item.description: Launch your personal OpenClaw Bot assistant. Connect WhatsApp and Telegram — it searches, schedules, messages, and solves for you.

item.title: GPT‑5.3‑Codex‑Spark
item.description: This is the 21st launch from OpenAI. View more GPT‑5.3‑Codex‑SparkLaunched this weekAn ultra-fast model for real-time coding in Codex15x faster generation, 128k context, now in research preview for ChatGPT Pro users. Codex-Spark is optimized for interactive work where latency matters as much as intelligence. You can collaborate with the model in real time, interrupting or redirecting it as it works, and rapidly iterate with near-instant responses. Because it’s tuned for speed, Codex-Spark keeps its default working style lightweight:

item.title: MailMolt
item.description: Give your AI agent its own email address — not access to yours. Full inbox capabilities with built-in human oversight. Send, receive, search, and thread emails. Progressive trust levels keep agents safe. Free during beta.

item.title: HookWatch
item.description: Never miss a webhook again. HookWatch monitors, logs, and retries your webhooks automatically. Built for indie hackers and small teams. HookWatch monitors your webhook endpoints 24/7 and alerts you instantly when something breaks. Built for developers who need reliable monitoring without enterprise complexity. Simple setup, affordable pricing, peace of mind.

item.title: Product Front
item.description: A visibility-first discovery platform built to put your product in front page. Tired of your launch getting buried? Our streamlined UI/UX design and weekly relaunch feature ensure your product gets a higher chance to be visible on screen without users needing to scroll for miles, Whether you’re a curator hunting for the next big tool or a solopreneur looking for those crucial first users, we level the playing field. No "top 5" paywalls—just pure discovery for makers who are just getting started.

item.title: GLM-5
item.description: This is the 8th launch from Z.ai. View more GLM-5Launched this weekOpen-weights model for long-horizon agentic engineeringA 744B MoE model (40B active) built for complex systems & agentic tasks. #1 open-source on Vending Bench 2, narrowing the gap with Claude Opus 4.5. Features DeepSeek Sparse Attention and "slime" RL infra.FreeLaunch tags:Open Source•Artificial Intelligence•DevelopmentLaunch Team

item.title: Lovon AI Therapy
item.description: This is the 2nd launch from Lovon AI therapy. View more Lovon AI TherapyLaunched this weekTalk it out and feel betterAI therapy you can actually talk to. Just speak naturally and get support anytime you need it.Free OptionsLaunch tags:Artificial Intelligence•HealthLaunch Team / Built With

item.title: Toolspend
item.description: Stop losing money on forgotten SaaS subscriptions and "ghost" licenses. Toolspend is the ultimate command center for your stack, designed to give you 100% spend visibility without the manual upkeep. While other tools just list your apps, Toolspend deep-dives into your actual usage and spend patterns. We identify underutilized seats, detect duplicate tools across teams, and alert you before every renewal. Toolspend helps you automate the toil of procurement so you can focus on building!

item.title: Base44 Backend Platform
item.description: This is the 4th launch from Base44. View more Base44 Backend PlatformLaunching todayThe Backend for the age of AIComplete backend for building apps with AI agents. Battle-tested by millions of production apps, now available as a standalone service optimized for Claude Code and Cursor. Deploy full-stack apps in one command, no backend setup, no configuration. AI agents use simple Skills instead of complex APIs. $ npx base44@latest createFreeLaunch tags:Developer Tools•Artificial Intelligence•GitHubLaunch Team / Built With
